title: French wine exporters 'hugely disappointed' over US tariff exemption failure
summary: (KPL/AFP) The French wine exporters federation said Thursday it was "hugely disappointed" by the European Union's admission that it failed to secure a tariff exemption for the sector in the US-EU trade deal.
